description: The things you surround yourself with soon wither away.
name: cursed aura

talents.info_text:
Your defiling touch permeates everything around you, permanently imparting a random curse on each item you find. When you equip a cursed item, you gain the effects of that curse (shown as a beneficial effect). Each item with the same curse that is equipped increases the curse's power. Initially curses are harmful, but powerful benefits accumulate as the power of the curse increases.

The Dark Gifts talent unlocks higher level curse effects and increases their power.

Your aura permeates your equipment more thoroughly with talent level and can affect items as follows:

  • Level 1 — weapons
  • Level 2 — body armor and cloaks
  • Level 3 — shields and helmets
  • Level 4 — gloves, boots and belts
  • Level 6 — rings
  • Level 7 — amulets/necklaces
  • Level 8 — lites
  • Level 9 — tools/totems/torques/wands
  • level 10 — ammunition

At level 5, you can activate this talent to surround yourself with an aura that adds 2 levels to a curse of your choosing. (None chosen)

Also, talent levels above 5 reduce the negative effects of your curses (currently 0%, 0%, 0%, 2%, 17% reduction).
talents.name: Defiling Touch

talents.info_text:
Your curses bring you dark gifts. Unlocks bonus level 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 effects on all of your curses, allowing you to gain that effect when the power level of your curse reaches that level. At talent level 5, the luck penalty of cursed effects is reduced to 1.

Talent levels above 5 add bonus power levels to your curses, increasing their effects (currently 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.3, 1.3).
talents.name: Dark Gifts

talents.info_text: Curse the earth around you in a radius of 3, 4, 5, 7, 8 for 4, 5, 6, 8, 8 turns. Any who stand upon it are weakened, reducing the damage they inflict by 25%, 36%, 44%, 51%, 57%
talents.name: Ruined Earth

talents.info_text: Instill a part of your living curse into a weapon in your inventory, and toss it nearby. This nearly impervious sentry will attack all nearby enemies for 8, 11, 14, 16, 18 turns. When the curse ends, the weapon will drop to the ground. Attack Speed: 69%, 99%, 123%, 142%, 160%
talents.name: Cursed Sentry

description: You are wracked with the dark energies of the curse.
name: cursed form

talents.info_text:
Your body's strength is fed by your hatred. This causes most forms of healing to be between 50% effective (at 0 Hate) to 100% effective (at 100+ Hate). In addition, after each kill, you store the waning life force to invigorate yourself, restoring 55, 74, 90, 103, 114 life (limited by the foe's maximum life, up to a maximum of 122, 168, 205, 237, 266 at any time). You can heal no more than 30, 40, 47, 53, 59 life per turn this way, and it is not affected by your hatred level or other effects.

Healing from kills improves with your Willpower.
talents.name: Unnatural Body

talents.info_text: Your thirst for blood drives your movements. You gain +19%, +33%, +43%, +51%, +56% confusion, fear, knockback and stun immunity.
talents.name: Relentless

talents.info_text: You have learned to hold onto your hate and use your suffering to fuel your body's rage. Every turn you take damage, the damage you inflict increases, until it reaches a maximum of +10%, +15%, +19%, +22%, +26% after 5 turns. Any turn in which you do not take damage will reduce the bonus.
talents.name: Seethe

talents.info_text: You rise to meet the pain that others would inflict on you. Every turn you take damage, your Strength and Willpower increase until they reach a maximum of +5, +8, +9, +11, +12 after 5 turns. Any turn in which you do not take damage will reduce the bonus. While in effect, your body also has a 11%, 16%, 20%, 23%, 26% chance to overcome poisons and diseases each turn.
talents.name: Grim Resolve

description: Invoke the powerful force of your will.
name: dark sustenance

talents.info_text:
Feed from the essence of your enemy. Draws 4.3, 5.2, 5.9, 6.6, 7.1 hate per turn from a targeted foe, as long as they remain in your line of sight.

Hate gain improves with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Feed

talents.info_text:
Devours life from the target of your feeding. 93, 126, 151, 173, 193 life from the victim will be added to your own. This healing cannot be reduced. At level 5, Devour Life can be used like the Feed talent to begin feeding.

Improves with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Devour Life

talents.info_text:
Enhances your feeding by reducing your targeted foe's damage by 11%, 13%, 14%, 16%, 17%, and increasing yours by the same amount.

Improves with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Feed Power

talents.info_text:
Enhances your feeding by reducing your targeted foe's positive resistances by 34%, 38%, 41%, 43%, 45%, and increasing yours by the same amount. Resistance to "all" is not affected.

Improves with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Feed Strengths

description: Harness the power of darkness to envelop your foes.
name: darkness

talents.info_text:
Creeping dark slowly spreads from 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 spots in a radius of 3 around the targeted location. The dark deals 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 damage, and blocks the sight of any who do not possess Dark Vision or some other magical means of seeing.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower. You do +5%, +9%, +12%, +15%, +17% damage to anything that has entered your creeping dark.
talents.name: Creeping Darkness

talents.info_text:
Your eyes penetrate the darkness to find anyone that may be hiding there. This allows you to see through creeping darkness out to a radius of 2, 3, 5, 6, 7. You can also find your way through the darkness with greater speed (+91%, +153%, +207%, +257%, +304% movement into creeping darkness).

You do +5%, +9%, +12%, +15%, +17% damage to anything that has entered your creeping dark.
talents.name: Dark Vision

talents.info_text:
Sends a torrent of searing darkness through your foes, doing 191, 259, 312, 357, 396 damage. There is a 25% chance the rushing darkness will blind them for 3 turns, and cause them to forget their target.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower. You do +5%, +9%, +12%, +15%, +17% damage to anything that has entered your creeping dark.
talents.name: Dark Torrent

talents.info_text:
Send tendrils of creeping dark out to attack your target, and pin them in the darkness for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns. Creeping dark will trail behind the tendrils as they move. The darkness does 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 damage per turn.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower. You do +5%, +9%, +12%, +15%, +17% damage to anything that has entered your creeping dark.
talents.name: Dark Tendrils

description: Each day, you lift your weary body and begin the unending hunt.
name: endless hunt

talents.info_text:
When you focus your attacks on a single foe and strike them in melee for two consecutive turns, your hatred of them overcomes you and you begin to stalk them with single-minded purpose. The effect will last for 40 turns, or until your prey is dead. Stalking gives you bonuses against your foe that grow each turn you hit them, and diminish each turn you don't.

Bonus level 1: +13, +17, +20, +22, +24 Accuracy, +8%, +9%, +9%, +10%, +11% melee damage, +0.50 hate/turn prey was hit

Bonus level 2: +18, +24, +28, +32, +35 Accuracy, +16%, +18%, +19%, +21%, +23% melee damage, +1.00 hate/turn prey was hit

Bonus level 3: +22, +29, +35, +39, +43 Accuracy, +24%, +27%, +29%, +32%, +35% melee damage, +1.50 hate/turn prey was hit

The accuracy bonus improves with your Willpower, and the melee damage bonus with your Strength.
talents.name: Stalk

talents.info_text:
The connection between predator and prey allows you to speak to the mind of your target and beckon them closer. For 7, 10, 12, 15, 18 turns, they will try to come to you, even pushing others aside to do so. They will move towards you instead of acting 27%, 37%, 44%, 50%, 55% of the time, but can save verses Mindpower to slow the effect. If they take significant damage, the beckoning may be overcome altogether. The effect makes concentration difficult for your target, reducing Spellpower and Mindpower by 14, 18, 22, 24, 27 until they reach you.

The Spellpower and Mindpower reduction increases with your Willpower.
talents.name: Beckon

talents.info_text:
Harass your stalked victim with two quick attacks for 35% (at 0 Hate) to 67% (at 100+ Hate) damage each. Each attack that scores a hit disrupts one talent, rune or infusion for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns. Your opponent will be unnerved by the attacks, reducing the damage they deal by 63%, 69%, 72%, 75%, 76% for 2 turns.

Damage reduction increases with the Willpower stat.
talents.name: Harass Prey

talents.info_text:
Let hate fuel your movements. While active, you gain 60%, 79%, 94%, 106%, 116% movement speed. The recklessness of your movement brings you bad luck (Luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

The speed of your movements, combined with the balance and utility of two weapons, gives you 17, 22, 26, 29, 32 extra Defense while dual-wielding.

Movement speed and dual-wielding Defense both increase with with the Willpower stat.
talents.name: Surge

description: Use the fear that lies at the heart of your curse to attack the minds of your enemies.
name: fears

talents.info_text:
Instill fear in your target, causing one of several possible fears that lasts for 8 turns. There is also a 25% chance of instilling fear in any foe in a radius of 2. The target can save versus Mindpower to resist the effect, and can be affected by multiple fears.

You gain 2 new fears: The Paranoid effect gives the target an 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 60% chance to physically attack a nearby creature, friend or foe. If hit, their target will be afflicted with Paranoia as well. The Despair effect reduces the target's resistance to all damage by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52%.

Fear effects improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Instill Fear

talents.info_text:
Heighten the fears of everyone around you. Any foe you inflict at least one fear upon and who remains in a radius of 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 and in sight of you for 5 (non-consecutive) turns, will gain a new fear that lasts for 8 turns. The target can save versus Mindpower to resist the effect, and each added fear reduces the chances of another by 10%.

You gain 2 new fears: The Terrified effect causes talents and attacks to fail 28%, 38%, 46%, 50%, 50% of the time. The Distressed effect reduces all saves by 18, 25, 30, 35, 38.

Fear effects improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Heighten Fear

talents.info_text:
Impose your tyranny on the minds of those who fear you. Your mindpower is increased by 7, 11, 13, 15, 17 against foes who attempt to resist your fears.

You gain 2 new fears: The Haunted effect causes each existing or new fear effect that the target suffers from to inflict 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 mind damage. The Tormented effect causes 5, 5, 6, 6, 7 apparitions to manifest and attack the target, inflicting 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 mind damage each before disappearing.

Fear effects improve with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Tyrant

talents.info_text: Panic your enemies within a range of 4 for 5, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns. Anyone who fails to make a mental save against your Mindpower has a 33%, 43%, 51%, 58%, 60% chance each turn of trying to run away from you.
talents.name: Panic

description: Invoke the powerful force of your will.
name: force of will

talents.info_text:
Focusing your hate, you strike your foe with unseen force for 191, 259, 312, 357, 396 damage and 2 knockback.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Willful Strike

talents.info_text:
Create a barrier that siphons hate from you at the rate of 0.2 a turn. The barrier will deflect 50% of incoming damage with the force of your will, up to 163, 221, 266, 304, 338 damage. The barrier charges at a rate of 1/35th of its maximum charge per turn.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

The maximum damage deflected increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Deflection

talents.info_text:
You rage coalesces at a single point, and then explodes outward, blasting enemies within a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 in all directions. The blast causes 205, 279, 335, 383, 426 damage and 2 knockback at the center, that decreases with distance. Anyone caught in the explosion will also be dazed for 3 turns.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Blast

talents.info_text:
Your fury becomes an unseen force that randomly lashes out at foes around you. For 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns you strike 1 (0% chance for 2) nearby target(s) within range 5 doing 93, 126, 151, 173, 193 damage and 2 knockback. The number of extra strikes increases at higher talent levels.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Unseen Force

description: Enhance the power of you mind with gestures.
name: gestures

talents.info_text:
Use a gesture of pain in place of a normal attack to assault the minds of your enemies, inflicting between 43, 59, 70, 80, 89 and 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 mind damage. If the attack succeeds, there is a 12%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 22% chance to stun your opponent for 3 turns.

This strike replaces your melee physical and checks your Mindpower against your opponent's Mental Save, and is thus not affected by your Accuracy or the enemy's Defense. It also does not trigger any physical on-hit effects. However, the base damage and the critical chance of any Mindstars equipped are added in when this attack is performed.

This talent requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands and has a 25% chance to inflict cross tier effects which can be critical hits. The damage will increase with your Mindpower. Mindstars bonuses from damage and physical criticals: (+0 damage, +0 critical chance)
talents.name: Gesture of Pain

talents.info_text: Enhance your Gesture of Pain with a malicious curse that causes any victim that is struck to have all resistances lowered by 7%, 13%, 17%, 21%, 24% for 5 turns.
talents.name: Gesture of Malice

talents.info_text:
Enhance your mental attacks with a single gesture. You gain +2, +5, +7, +10, +13 mindpower and +1%, +3%, +4%, +6%, +7% chance to inflict critical damage with mind-based attacks (current chance is 0%, 0%, 13%, 28%, 43%).

Requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands; does not require Gesture of Pain to be sustained.
talents.name: Gesture of Power

talents.info_text:
You guard against melee damage with a sweep of your hand. So long as you can use Gestures (Requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands), you deflect up to 7, 9, 12, 14, 16 damage (16%, 22%, 27%, 32%, 36% of your best free hand melee damage) from up to 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.2 melee attack(s) each turn (based on your cunning).

If Gesture of Pain is active, you also have a 4.4%, 6.1%, 7.7%, 9.1%, 11% chance to counterattack.
talents.name: Gesture of Guarding

description: All those in your sight must share your despair.
name: gloom

talents.info_text:
A terrible gloom surrounds you, affecting all those who approach to within radius 3. Each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower, or have an 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17% chance to suffer from slowness, stun or confusion for 3 turns.

This ability is innate, and carries no cost to activate or deactivate. Each point in Gloom increases the mindpower of all gloom effects (current: +1, +3, +4, +6, +7).
talents.name: Gloom

talents.info_text:
Each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower, or have an 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17% chance to be crippled by fear for 3 turns, reducing damage they inflict by -14%, -20%, -24%, -27%, -29%. The first time you melee strike a foe after they have been weakened will give you 2 hate.

Each point in Weakness increases the Mindpower of all gloom effects (current: +1, +3, +4, +6, +7).
talents.name: Weakness

talents.info_text:
Each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower or have an 4.0%, 5.7%, 7.0%, 8.0%, 8.9% chance of becoming dismayed for 3 turns. When dismayed, the first melee attack against the foe will result in a critical hit.

Each point in Dismay increases the Mindpower of all gloom effects (current: +1, +3, +4, +6, +7).
talents.name: Dismay

talents.info_text:
Your gloom has become a sanctuary from the outside world. Damage from any attack that originates beyond the boundary of your gloom is reduced by 12%, 17%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Each point in Sanctuary increases the Mindpower of all gloom effects (current: +1, +3, +4, +6, +7).
talents.name: Sanctuary

description: Harness your shadows to their full potential.
name: one with shadows

talents.info_text:
Your awareness extends to your shadows.

You always know exactly where your shadows are and can perceive any foe within 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 tiles of their vision.
talents.name: Shadow Senses

talents.info_text:
You are linked to your shadows for 3, 6, 8, 10, 11 turns, diverting 30%, 39%, 46%, 52%, 58% of all damage you take to a random shadow.

Effect increases with Mindpower.
talents.name: Shadow Empathy

talents.info_text:
Observers find it difficult to tell you and your shadows apart.

You can target a shadow in radius 2, 6, 11, 15, 20 and instantly trade places with it.

1, 1, 2, 3, 3 random negative physical or magical effects are transferred from you to the chosen shadow in the process.
talents.name: Shadow Transposition

talents.info_text:
Your shadows guard you with their lifes.

When you would receive a fatal blow, you instantly transpose with a random shadow that takes the blow instead, putting this talent on cooldown.

For the next 4 turns you only die if you reach -215, -289, -345, -393, -436 life. However, when below 0 you cannot see how much life you have left.

Effect increases with Mindpower.
talents.name: Shadow Decoy

description: Track and kill your prey with single-minded focus.
name: predator

talents.info_text:
Mark a single opponent as your prey, gaining bonuses against the targeted creature's type and sub-type. Bonuses scale with the experience you gain from killing your marked type (+0.25 kill experience) and marked sub-type (+1 kill experience). At 20, 19, 18, 17, 16 kill experience, you reach 100% effectiveness. Combat attacks against the marked type gain +7%, +10%, +12%, +14%, +16% damage, while those against the marked sub-type gain +17%, +24%, +29%, +34%, +38% damage.

Each point in Mark Prey reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
talents.name: Mark Prey

talents.info_text:
Your knowledge of your prey allows you to strike with extra precision. Attacks against the marked type gain +2, +3, +5, +6, +7 Accuracy, while those against the marked sub-type gain +5, +9, +12, +15, +18 Accuracy. Melee hits also gain a 3.6%, 5.0%, 6.2%, 7.1%, 7.9% chance to stun the marked sub-type for 3 turns with each attack.

Each point in Anatomy reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
talents.name: Anatomy

talents.info_text:
Each melee hit gives you a chance to outmaneuver your marked prey, lowering their physical resistance by 9%, 13%, 16%, 18%, 20% and reducing their highest statistic by 4, 6, 8, 9, 10. Subject to your effectiveness against the marked prey, there is a 4.6%, 6.5%, 8.0%, 9.1%, 10% chance to outmaneuver your marked type and a 12%, 17%, 20%, 23%, 25% maximum chance to outmaneuver your marked sub-type. The effects last for 10 turns, and can accumulate.

Each point in Outmaneuver reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
talents.name: Outmaneuver

talents.info_text:
You learn to mimic the strengths of your prey. Killing a marked sub-type raises your stats to match the strengths of the victim (up to a maximum of 8, 13, 18, 22, 26 total points, subject to your current effectiveness). The effect lasts indefinitely, but only the effects of the lastest kill will be applied.

Each point in Mimic reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
talents.name: Mimic

description: Your hate becomes punishment in the minds of your foes.
name: punishments

talents.info_text:
You unleash your hateful mind on any who dare approach you, inflicing 191, 259, 312, 357, 396 mind damage. The attack will hit multiple targets, but each additional target will further reduce damage by 19%.

25% chance of cross tier effects. The damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Reproach

talents.info_text:
Send a whisper filled with hate to spread throughout your foes. When the whisper is first heard, they will suffer 205, 279, 335, 383, 426 mind damage and feed you 2 hate. For the first 1, 2, 3, 3, 3 turns, the whisper will travel from the original victim to a new one within a range of 1.6, 2.3, 2.8, 3.2, 3.6. Every victim of the whisper has a 17%, 24%, 29%, 34%, 38% chance of spreading it to another victim every turn.

25% chance of cross tier effects. The damage increases with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Hateful Whisper

talents.info_text:
Unleash agony upon your target. The pain will grow over the course of 5 turns. The first turn will inflict 21, 29, 34, 39, 44 damage, and slowly increase to 107, 145, 174, 199, 221 on the last turn (321, 435, 523, 598, 665 total).

25% chance of cross tier effects. The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
talents.name: Agony

talents.info_text: Every time you inflict mental damage, there is a 9%, 13%, 16%, 18%, 20% chance that your foe must save against your Mindpower or go mad. Madness can cause them to become confused, slowed or stunned for 3 turns, and lowers resistance to mental damage by 18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37%.
talents.name: Madness

description: Let loose the hate that has grown within.
name: rampage

talents.info_text:
You enter a terrible rampage for 5 turns (up to a maximum of 8 turns), destroying everything in your path. Starting a rampage is instantaneous. You may also enter a rampage (50% chance) when you are hit for more than 8% of your max life.

Any talent, rune or infusion you use while rampaging becomes a distraction, and reduces the duration of the rampage by 1. Your first movement while rampaging increases the rampage duration by 1.

Rampage Bonus: +156%, +217%, +271%, +320%, +366% movement speed.

Rampage Bonus: +24%, +34%, +43%, +51%, +58% attack speed
talents.name: Rampage

talents.info_text:
You attack with mindless brutality. The first critical hit inflicted while rampaging increases the rampage duration by 1.

Rampage Bonus: Your physical damage increases by 14%, 24%, 31%, 37%, 43%.

Rampage Bonus: Your Physical Save increases by 7, 11, 15, 19, 22 and Mental Save increases by 7, 11, 15, 19, 22.
talents.name: Brutality

talents.info_text:
Nothing will stop your rampage.

Rampage Bonus: You shrug off up to 39, 51, 60, 68, 74 damage each turn during your rampage. If you shrug off more than 158, 206, 242, 272, 299 damage, the rampage duration increases by 1.

The amount of damage you can shrug off improves with your Strength.
talents.name: Tenacity

talents.info_text:
While rampaging, you slam up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 adjacent opponents, stunning them for 2 turns and damaging them for between 46, 63, 75, 86, 96 and 93, 126, 151, 173, 193 physical damage. Your first slam of at least two opponents increases the rampage duration by 1.

Damage increases with your Physical Power.
talents.name: Slam

description: Summon shadows from the darkness to aid you.
name: shadows

talents.info_text: While this ability is active, you will continually call up to 1, 1, 2, 2, 3 level 1, 10, 25, 40, 50 shadows to aid you in battle. Each shadow costs 6 hate to summon. Shadows are weak combatants that can: Use Arcane Reconstruction to heal themselves (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), Blindside their opponents (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), and Phase Door from place to place.
talents.name: Call Shadows

talents.info_text: Instill hate in your shadows, strengthening their attacks. They gain 14%, 25%, 33%, 40%, 47% extra Accuracy and 22%, 38%, 51%, 62%, 71% extra damage. The fury of their attacks gives them the ability to try to Dominate their foes, increasing all damage taken by that foe for 4 turns (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17% chance at range 1). They also gain the ability to Fade when hit, avoiding all damage until their next turn (7, 6, 5, 4, 3 turn cooldown).
talents.name: Shadow Warriors

talents.info_text:
Infuse magic into your shadows to give them fearsome spells. Your shadows receive a bonus of 4, 8, 12, 15, 18 to their Spellpower.

Your shadows can strike adjacent foes with Lightning (level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17% chance at range 1).

At level 3 your shadows can sear their enemies from a distance with Flames (level 0, 0, 3, 4, 5, 0%, 0%, 13%, 15%, 17% chance at range 2 to 6).

At level 5 when your shadows are struck down they will attempt to Reform, becoming whole again (50% chance).
talents.name: Shadow Mages

talents.info_text:
Focus your shadows on a single target. Friendly targets will be defended for 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns. Hostile targets will be attacked, with a 47%, 66%, 75%, 80%, 84% chance the shadows will blindside the target.

This talent has no cost.
talents.name: Focus Shadows

description: Your weapon yearns for its next victim.
name: slaughter

talents.info_text:
You slash wildly at your target for 126%, 130%, 134%, 138%, 141% (at 0 Hate) to 188%, 201%, 214%, 227%, 239% (at 100+ Hate) damage.

At level 3, any wound you inflict with this carries a part of your curse, reducing the effectiveness of healing by 16%, 16%, 21%, 26%, 30% for 15 turns. The effect will stack.

The damage multiplier increases with your Strength.
talents.name: Slash

talents.info_text:
Assault nearby foes with 4 fast attacks for 26%, 29%, 32%, 35%, 38% (at 0 Hate) to 53%, 59%, 65%, 71%, 77% (at 100+ Hate) damage each. Stalked prey are always targeted if nearby.

At level 3 the intensity of your assault overwhelms anyone who is struck, reducing their Accuracy by 11, 11, 16, 21, 24 for 3 turns.

The damage multiplier and Accuracy reduction increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Frenzy

talents.info_text: Charge through your opponents, attacking anyone near your path for 35% (at 0 Hate) to 70% (at 100+ Hate) damage. Small, Small, Medium-sized, Medium-sized, Big opponents may be knocked away from your path. You can attack a maximum of 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 times, and can hit targets along your path more than once.
talents.name: Reckless Charge

talents.info_text:
While active, every swing of your weapon has a 19%, 21%, 23%, 25%, 27% (if one-handed) or 31%, 32%, 33%, 35%, 36% (if two-handed) chance of striking a second nearby target for 32%, 49%, 59%, 66%, 70% (at 0 Hate) to 49%, 66%, 74%, 79%, 83% (at 100+ Hate) damage (+25% for two-handed weapons). The recklessness of your attacks brings you bad luck (luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

The Cleave chance and damage increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Cleave

description: The battlefield is your home; death and confusion, your comfort.
name: strife

talents.info_text:
Turn your attention to a nearby foe, and dominate them with your overwhelming presence. If the target fails to save versus your Mindpower, it will be unable to move for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns and vulnerable to attacks. They will lose 13, 17, 20, 22, 24 Armour, 19, 24, 29, 32, 36 Defense and your attacks will gain 41%, 48%, 52%, 55%, 57% resistance penetration. If the target is adjacent to you, your domination will include a melee attack.

Effects will improve with your Willpower.
talents.name: Dominate

talents.info_text:
Your preternatural senses aid you in your hunt for the next victim. You sense foes in a radius of 2.0, 4.0, 5.0, 6.0, 7.0. You will always sense a stalked victim in a radius of 10.

Also increases stealth detection by 43, 59, 71, 81, 90 and invisibility detection by 43, 59, 71, 81, 90.

Stealth and invisibility detection improves with your Willpower
talents.name: Preternatural Senses

talents.info_text:
With blinding speed, you suddenly appear next to a target up to 6 spaces away and attack for 39%, 46%, 52%, 57%, 62% (at 0 Hate) to 131%, 156%, 175%, 192%, 206% (at 100+ Hate) damage. Your sudden appearance catches everyone off-guard, giving you 20, 27, 32, 36, 39 extra Defense for 1 turn.

The Defense boost improves with your Strength.
talents.name: Blindside

talents.info_text:
Rather than hide from the onslaught, you face down every threat. While active you have a 19%, 23%, 25%, 26%, 27% chance of repelling a melee attack. The recklessness of your defense brings you bad luck (Luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

Repel chance increases with your Strength, and when equipped with a shield.
talents.name: Repel
